short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: React to the world wide web.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Reactions is a delightful browser extension designed to bring a whole new dimension to your web browsing experience. Express yourself, engage with content, and connect with others like never before as you surf the World Wide Web. Whether you're browsing the latest news, exploring fascinating articles, or simply hanging out on social media, Reactions empowers you to react in real-time to any webpage you visit.
